column2: for the main course. I got the spicy chicken ramen (hot)
column3: w cabbage on the side and it was delicious. I expected crinkly
column6: but I got a more solid
column7: angel hair-like pasta in the bowl. The soup was filled w green onions
column9: kikurage (which had the consistency of chicken gristle) and two tender
column10: thinly sliced chicken pieces. The broth was really thick and flavorful. This place did not disappoint. I will be back to try other items on their menu.
